Windlord/Nightlight:

Have she been reprogrmated, the it hasn't a nightmare after all, 
tought Nighlgiht, after that her mind was to caverman. 

Windlord answered by comlink "I'm on the way" Windlord ran towards 
the  quarters where Rodimus and the Caverman were.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Rodimus let go of a sigh of relief.
> 
> Rodimus: Thank the Matrix, my Love, you're okay! It seems you 
> overcame that reprogramation the preds put you through. Let me 
> introduce your...
> 
> He was interrupted by the noise of the Caveman.
> 
> Rodimus: Windlord, Azure, come with me.
> 
> At that time, AzureBlade had been able to get up from the hole in 
the 
> wall thanks to Windlord. As he heard the sound, he decided to feel 
> for that unknown spark. It proved to be incredibly painful, but he 
> managed to do it.
> 
> AzureBlade: Thanks Windlord. Rodimus, I sense panick and anxiety. 
He 
> is a transformer, that's for sure, but... something seems wrong...
> 
> Rodimus: Alright. Let's check it out.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Nighlight:
> > 
> > Nighlight slowly opened her eyes... that voice, she remembered 
it 
> as 
> > that face,"Ro... Rodimus? what happened? why am I here?" 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > OOC: I know I should not be able to post, but I'm getting 
things 
> > > under control at school. I'll control Rodimus for the time 
being, 
> > > until Robo comes back.
> > > 
> > > BIC:
> > > 
> > > Slowly, Rodimus saw his love open her eyes. he walked to her 
side 
> > and 
> > > gently took her hand. He stroke her beautiful face, hoping it 
was 
> > > really her.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus: Nightlight? Is it you, my love?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> 
wrote:
> > > > Nightlight?
> > > > 
> > > > Time had passed since BlackStorm had been reprogramed to 
became 
> > > > Nightlight again. She slowly was waking up inside the 
quarters 
> > > where 
> > > > Ydrassil had been locked her up, but still she was confused 
and 
> > > > memories spinning as hurricanes inside her mind. Who was 
she? 
> > > > BlackStorm? Nightlight? both?
